title: Set Me Alight
description: After hitting the bottom of the barrel, Pete travels to Montana in a desperate attempt to find work. Pete's life has been nothing but disappointment up to this point, and his arrival in Montana is no different. Lucky for him, a seasoned forest firefighter named Paul takes him under his wing. The two of them unearth a conspiracy that is destroying the country. To put an end to it, Pete must travel to the financial capital of the world, and take down those that pull the strings on our lives.
author: Bill Leviathan
